عمّا اللّه كــ
وإنّي أسئل أسأل اللّه أن يمتّعني بك
وأحــمّه وأحمده وباحمه وليّ حبّه وأن لا يديّن يدبر يريني يومك
إلّا إلّا يومك خير فإذا جاك

and I beg God to let me derive pleasure from (being with) you And verily, I pray God that He may cause me to profit by you Und ich bitte Gott darum, daß er mir durch Dich
als Träger seiner Liebe Freude gebe und daß er mich Deinen Tag nicht sehen lasse, and ........., and that He may not revile your day; and (?) and that your day should not turn its back and I praise Him - and that He may not judge your (doom-) day save in the best way.
but that good (things, e.g. luck, prosperity etc.) should turn their face towards you. And when (my letter) comes to you ... is your day not excellent? But when [thi]s ohne daß Dein Tag etwas Gutes sei. Wenn Dich also
[dies]er [mein Brief] erreicht, [dann] [my let]t[er has reached you ...]
